Header.title: PROTECTING IDENTITIES. SECURING ACCESS. EMPOWERING TRUST.
Header.paragraph: Specializing in Identity & Access Management and Cyber Defense Solutions.

About.paragraph: With over 16 years of experience, JM Consultancy specializes in designing and implementing large-scale Identity & Access Management solutions. We are experts in Microsoft Entra ID, SailPoint, Okta, and cybersecurity compliance strategies, delivering modern cloud security and Zero Trust architectures for enterprises globally.

Services.name: Cybersecurity Risk Assessment
Services.text: We identify vulnerabilities across your infrastructure and recommend practical steps to harden your security posture.

Services.name: Identity & Access Management
Services.text: Design and deployment of secure IAM solutions—Single Sign-On (SSO), Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), and Privileged Access Management (PAM).

Services.name: Security Architecture Design
Services.text: We build scalable, future-proof architectures that embed security from the ground up.

Features.title: End-to-End Identity
Features.text: We design, deploy, and maintain secure IAM systems tailored to your business, ensuring only the right people access the right resources.

Features.title: Zero Trust Framework
Features.text: We help organizations adopt a modern security model built on strict access controls and continuous verification—no assumptions, no compromises.

Features.title: Seamless Integration
Features.text: Our solutions are compatible with all major cloud providers, SaaS platforms, and enterprise environments.

Features.title: Regulatory Compliance
Features.text: We ensure your systems align with global cybersecurity standards like ISO 27001, NIST, GDPR, and others.
